mapper.update:
update supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId}
task_parent_id = #{record.taskParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_name = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_start_time = #{record.taskStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_end_time = #{record.taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
supervision_user_id = #{record.supervisionUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_id = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_name = #{record.storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{record.businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete_time = #{record.completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
task_state = #{record.taskState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
form_id = #{record.formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
cancel_status = #{record.cancelStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
submit_time = #{record.submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
supervision_handle_user_id = #{record.supervisionHandleUserId},
supervision_handle_user_name = #{record.supervisionHandleUserName},
supervision_task_id = #{record.supervisionTaskId},
task_grouping = #{record.taskGrouping,jdbcType=BIT},
first_approve = #{record.firstApprove,jdbcType=BIT},
secondary_approve = #{record.secondaryApprove,jdbcType=BIT},
third_approve = #{record.thirdApprove,jdbcType=BIT},
current_node = #{record.currentNode,jdbcType=BIT},
reminder_time_before_starting = #{record.reminderTimeBeforeStarting,jdbcType=BIT},
reminder_time_before_end = #{record.reminderTimeBeforeEnd,jdbcType=BIT},
transfer_reassign_flag = #{record.transferReassignFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
handle_over_time_status = #{record.handleOverTimeStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
supervision_handle_user_id = #{record.supervisionHandleUserId,jdbcType=BIT},
supervision_handle_user_name = #{record.supervisionHandleUserName,jdbcType=BIT},
region_path = #{record.regionPath},
approve_status = #{record.approveStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} where task_parent_id = #{parentId}
and supervision_task_id = #{supervisionTaskId}
#{storeId}
region_path like concat('%/', #{regionId}, '/%')
and supervision_handle_user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and (handle_over_time_status = #{handleOverTimeStatus} or (task_state = 0 and handle_over_time_status = 0 and task_end_time < now()))
and ((handle_over_time_status = 0 AND task_state != 0) or (task_state=0 and task_end_time > now()) )
(task_state = 0 )
( task_state = 1)
( task_state = 4)
( cancel_status = 1)

from supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} where supervision_handle_user_id = #{userId}
and supervision_task_id = #{taskId}
and store_name like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
and (handle_over_time_status = #{handleOverTimeStatus} or (task_state = 0 and handle_over_time_status = 0 and task_end_time < now()))
and ((handle_over_time_status = 0 AND task_state != 0) or (task_state=0 and task_end_time > now()) )
and task_state = 0
and task_state = 1
and task_state = 4
and cancel_status = 1
and cancel_status = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} ( `task_parent_id`, `task_name`, `task_start_time`, `task_end_time`, `supervision_user_id`, `create_time`, `task_state`, `business_type`, `store_id`, `store_name`, `form_id`, `supervision_task_id`, `sop_ids`, `priority`, task_grouping, first_approve, secondary_approve, third_approve, reminder_time_before_starting, reminder_time_before_end, supervision_handle_user_id, supervision_handle_user_name, approve_status, region_path ) values
( #{record.taskParentId}, #{record.taskName}, #{record.taskStartTime}, #{record.taskEndTime}, #{record.supervisionUserId}, now(), #{record.taskState}, #{record.businessType}, #{record.storeId}, #{record.storeName}, #{record.formId}, #{record.supervisionTaskId}, #{record.sopIds}, #{record.priority}, #{record.taskGrouping}, #{record.firstApprove}, #{record.secondaryApprove}, #{record.thirdApprove}, #{record.reminderTimeBeforeStarting}, #{record.reminderTimeBeforeEnd}, #{record.supervisionHandleUserId}, #{record.supervisionHandleUserName}, #{record.approveStatus}, #{record.regionPath} )
mapper.update:
update supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} set task_state = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN #{record.taskState}
END, complete_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.completeTime},complete_time)
END, submit_time = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.submitTime},submit_time)
END, handle_over_time_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.handleOverTimeStatus},handle_over_time_status)
END, current_node = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.currentNode},current_node)
END, approve_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN ifnull(#{record.approveStatus},approve_status)
END where id in
#{record.id}

update supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} set supervision_handle_user_id = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.supervisionHandleUserId},supervision_handle_user_id)
END, supervision_handle_user_name = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.supervisionHandleUserName},supervision_handle_user_name)
END, first_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.firstApprove},first_approve)
END, secondary_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.secondaryApprove},secondary_approve)
END, third_approve = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.thirdApprove},third_approve)
END, supervision_task_id = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.supervisionTaskId},supervision_task_id)
END, transfer_reassign_flag = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.transferReassignFlag},transfer_reassign_flag)
END where id in
#{record.id}
mapper.select:
select
from supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId}
and store_name like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
and transfer_reassign_flag = 0
and cancel_status = 0
and task_state != 1
#{supervisionTaskId}
mapper.update:
update supervision_store_task_${enterpriseId} set task_state = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.taskState},task_state)
END, cancel_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.cancelStatus},cancel_status)
END, handle_over_time_status = CASE id
WHEN #{record.id} THEN IFNULL(#{record.handleOverTimeStatus},handle_over_time_status)
END where id in
